sentences.en: And the son of Carmi : Achar , the troubler of Israel, who transgressed by what was accursed.
sentences.cn: 7迦米的儿子是亚割珥, 这亚割珥在当灭的物上犯了罪,叫以色列人遭祸.

sentences.en: And the sons of Carmi ; Achar , the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.

sentences.en: Study and investigation of this strange idiom lead to the mysterious point of intersection of regular society with society which is accursed.
sentences.cn: 对这种奇特语言深入的钻研能把人引向正常社会和那被诅咒的社会幽奥的交叉点。

sentences.en: The accursed shark alone in any generic respect be said to bear comprarative analogy the dog.
sentences.cn: 就一般情况说来,只有那种可恶的鲨鱼,才可以说是具有跟狗相似的癖性.

sentences.en: Then you condemn me to live wretched and to die accursed?
sentences.cn: 那么你就是判定我活着受罪,死后要受诅咒了?

sentences.en: There was one accursed deed done at this spot before now.
sentences.cn: 从前这块地方发生过一桩骇人听闻的事件.
